short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the workflow of various instructor tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the workflow of various instructor tasks for codeninjas. Shows a pop-up menu with options for lesson slides. Select slide # on dropdown menu and submit to open a new window for designated lesson slides 1-30. Additionally has instructor specific websites that require password to access.
